price: Enti mo (mu) boniayεfoͻ no kyεn woi nom (a yɛaseε wͻn no)? Anaasε modeε moanya (bͻhyε) wͻ Twerεsεm no mu sε yɛayi mu afiri (asotwee no) mu?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
